title: The Early Bird feat. Megan Boone & Jazmyn Simon
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jazmyn Simon (Ballers, Most Perfect You) and Megan Boone (The Blacklist, The Underground Railroad) play competing birds in this Native American story about the surprising ways that slow and steady can win the race.
itunes:author: WBUR
